targets.rawSql:
SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM dz_devices_current
WHERE status = 'activated'

SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM dz_links_current_health
WHERE is_operational = true

SELECT COUNT(*) as value
FROM dz_links_current_health
WHERE is_soft_drained = true OR is_hard_drained = true

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT owner_pk || ':' || client_ip) as value
FROM dz_users_history u
WHERE u.op != 'D'
  AND u.status = 'activated'
  AND u.valid_from <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
  AND (u.valid_to IS NULL OR u.valid_to > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
  AND u.dz_ip IS NOT NULL
  AND u.owner_pk NOT IN (SELECT owner_pk FROM dz_owners_internal)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT link_pk) as value
FROM (
  SELECT link_pk
  FROM dz_link_health_core
  WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND time <= $__timeTo()
  GROUP BY link_pk
  HAVING 100.0 * AVG(CASE WHEN loss = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) >= 1.0
) links_with_loss

SELECT
  CAST(COALESCE(SUM(l.bandwidth_bps), 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Capacity (bps)",
  CASE
    WHEN SUM(l.bandwidth_bps) > 0 THEN CAST((COALESCE(MAX(peak_throughput.peak_throughput), 0) / SUM(l.bandwidth_bps) * 100.0) AS DOUBLE)
    ELSE 0.0
  END as "Utilization %"
FROM dz_links_current l
JOIN dz_devices_current da ON l.side_a_pk = da.pk
JOIN dz_devices_current dz ON l.side_z_pk = dz.pk
LEFT JOIN dz_metros_current ma ON da.metro_pk = ma.pk
LEFT JOIN dz_metros_current mz ON dz.metro_pk = mz.pk
LEFT JOIN (
  SELECT
    u.link_pk,
    MAX((u.in_octets_delta + u.out_octets_delta) * 8.0 / NULLIF(u.delta_duration, 0)) as peak_throughput
  FROM dz_device_iface_usage_raw u
  WHERE
    u.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND u.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND u.delta_duration > 0
    AND u.in_octets_delta >= 0
    AND u.out_octets_delta >= 0
    AND u.link_pk IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY u.link_pk
) peak_throughput ON peak_throughput.link_pk = l.pk
WHERE
  l.link_type = 'WAN'
  AND ma.pk != mz.pk

SELECT
  d.code AS "Device Code",
  d.status AS "Status"
FROM dz_devices_current d
WHERE d.status != 'activated'
  AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR d.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ','))))
ORDER BY d.code
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  l.link_code AS "Link Code",
  l.status AS "Status"
FROM dz_links_current_health l
WHERE l.is_operational = false
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR l.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
ORDER BY l.link_code
LIMIT 500

WITH interface_health AS (
  SELECT
    h.device_pk,
    h.intf,
    SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors) AS total_errors,
    SUM(h.in_discards + h.out_discards) AS total_discards,
    SUM(h.carrier_transitions) AS carrier_transitions
  FROM dz_device_iface_health h
  WHERE h.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND h.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR h.device_pk IN (SELECT pk FROM dz_devices_current WHERE code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ',')))))
  GROUP BY h.device_pk, h.intf
  HAVING SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors + h.in_discards + h.out_discards + h.carrier_transitions) > 0
)
SELECT
  l.code AS "Link Code",
  COALESCE(da.code, l.side_a_pk::text) || ':' || l.side_a_iface_name || ' ↔ ' || COALESCE(dz.code, l.side_z_pk::text) || ':' || l.side_z_iface_name AS "Endpoints",
  CAST(COALESCE(ia.total_errors, 0) + COALESCE(iz.total_errors, 0) AS DOUBLE) AS "Total Errors",
  CAST(COALESCE(ia.total_discards, 0) + COALESCE(iz.total_discards, 0) AS DOUBLE) AS "Total Discards",
  CAST(COALESCE(ia.carrier_transitions, 0) + COALESCE(iz.carrier_transitions, 0) AS DOUBLE) AS "Carrier Transitions"
FROM dz_links_current l
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current da ON da.pk = l.side_a_pk
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current dz ON dz.pk = l.side_z_pk
LEFT JOIN interface_health ia ON ia.device_pk = l.side_a_pk AND ia.intf = l.side_a_iface_name
LEFT JOIN interface_health iz ON iz.device_pk = l.side_z_pk AND iz.intf = l.side_z_iface_name
WHERE ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR l.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
  AND (COALESCE(ia.total_errors, 0) + COALESCE(iz.total_errors, 0) + COALESCE(ia.total_discards, 0) + COALESCE(iz.total_discards, 0) + COALESCE(ia.carrier_transitions, 0) + COALESCE(iz.carrier_transitions, 0) > 0)
ORDER BY "Total Errors" DESC, "Total Discards" DESC
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  COALESCE(d.code, h.device_pk::text) AS "Device Code",
  h.intf AS "Interface",
  CAST(SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors) AS DOUBLE) AS "Total Errors",
  CAST(SUM(h.in_discards + h.out_discards) AS DOUBLE) AS "Total Discards",
  CAST(SUM(h.carrier_transitions) AS DOUBLE) AS "Carrier Transitions"
FROM dz_device_iface_health h
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current d ON d.pk = h.device_pk
WHERE h.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND h.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR h.device_pk IN (SELECT pk FROM dz_devices_current WHERE code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ',')))))
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM dz_links_current l
    WHERE (l.side_a_pk = h.device_pk AND l.side_a_iface_name = h.intf)
       OR (l.side_z_pk = h.device_pk AND l.side_z_iface_name = h.intf)
  )
GROUP BY h.device_pk, h.intf, d.code
HAVING SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors + h.in_discards + h.out_discards + h.carrier_transitions) > 0
ORDER BY "Total Errors" DESC, "Total Discards" DESC
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  lh.link_code AS "Link Code",
  COALESCE(da.code, lh.side_a_device_pk::text) || ':' || lh.side_a_intf || ' ↔ ' || COALESCE(dz.code, lh.side_z_device_pk::text) || ':' || lh.side_z_intf AS "Endpoints",
  CAST(100.0 * AVG(CASE WHEN lh.loss = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) AS "Packet Loss %"
FROM dz_link_health_core lh
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current da ON da.pk = lh.side_a_device_pk
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current dz ON dz.pk = lh.side_z_device_pk
WHERE lh.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND lh.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR lh.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY lh.link_code, lh.side_a_device_pk, lh.side_a_intf, lh.side_z_device_pk, lh.side_z_intf, da.code, dz.code
HAVING AVG(CASE WHEN lh.loss = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) > 0
ORDER BY "Packet Loss %" DESC
LIMIT 500

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time) AS time,
  lh.link_code as metric,
  CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN lh.rtt_us > 0 THEN lh.rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) - MAX(lh.committed_rtt_us) AS DOUBLE) as "RTT Margin (µs)"
FROM dz_link_health_core lh
WHERE lh.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND lh.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR lh.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
  AND lh.rtt_us IS NOT NULL
  AND lh.committed_rtt_us IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time), lh.link_code
HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN lh.rtt_us > 0 THEN lh.rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "RTT Margin (µs)" DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time) AS time,
  lh.link_code as metric,
  CAST(100.0 * AVG(CASE WHEN lh.loss = true THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS DOUBLE) as "Packet Loss %"
FROM dz_link_health_core lh
WHERE lh.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND lh.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR lh.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time), lh.link_code
ORDER BY time ASC, "Packet Loss %" DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time) AS time,
  lh.link_code as metric,
  CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN lh.rtt_us > 0 THEN lh.rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) - MAX(lh.committed_rtt_us) AS DOUBLE) as "P95 - Committed (µs)"
FROM dz_link_health_core lh
WHERE lh.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND lh.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR lh.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
  AND lh.is_significant_rtt_violation = true
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time), lh.link_code
HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN lh.rtt_us > 0 THEN lh.rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "P95 - Committed (µs)" DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time) AS time,
  lh.link_code as metric,
  CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN lh.jitter_ipdv_us > 0 THEN lh.jitter_ipdv_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) - MAX(lh.committed_jitter_us) AS DOUBLE) as "Jitter Margin (µs)"
FROM dz_link_health_core lh
WHERE lh.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND lh.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR lh.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
  AND lh.jitter_ipdv_us IS NOT NULL
  AND lh.committed_jitter_us IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', lh.time), lh.link_code
HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN lh.jitter_ipdv_us > 0 THEN lh.jitter_ipdv_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "Jitter Margin (µs)" DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', h.time) AS time,
  COALESCE(d.code, h.device_pk::text) || ':' || h.intf as metric,
  CAST(SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Errors",
  CAST(SUM(h.in_discards + h.out_discards) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Discards",
  CAST(SUM(h.carrier_transitions) AS DOUBLE) as "Carrier Transitions"
FROM dz_device_iface_health h
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current d ON d.pk = h.device_pk
WHERE h.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND h.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR h.device_pk IN (SELECT pk FROM dz_devices_current WHERE code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ',')))))
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM dz_links_current l
    WHERE (l.side_a_pk = h.device_pk AND l.side_a_iface_name = h.intf)
       OR (l.side_z_pk = h.device_pk AND l.side_z_iface_name = h.intf)
  )
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', h.time), h.device_pk, h.intf, d.code
HAVING SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors + h.in_discards + h.out_discards + h.carrier_transitions) > 0
ORDER BY time ASC, ("Total Errors" + "Total Discards") DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', h.time) AS time,
  COALESCE(d.code, h.device_pk::text) || ':' || h.intf as metric,
  CAST(SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Errors",
  CAST(SUM(h.in_discards + h.out_discards) AS DOUBLE) as "Total Discards",
  CAST(SUM(h.carrier_transitions) AS DOUBLE) as "Carrier Transitions"
FROM dz_device_iface_health h
LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current d ON d.pk = h.device_pk
WHERE h.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND h.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR h.device_pk IN (SELECT pk FROM dz_devices_current WHERE code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ',')))))
  AND NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 FROM dz_links_current l
    WHERE (l.side_a_pk = h.device_pk AND l.side_a_iface_name = h.intf)
       OR (l.side_z_pk = h.device_pk AND l.side_z_iface_name = h.intf)
  )
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', h.time), h.device_pk, h.intf, d.code
HAVING SUM(h.in_errors + h.out_errors + h.in_discards + h.out_discards + h.carrier_transitions) > 0
ORDER BY time ASC, ("Total Errors" + "Total Discards") DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time) AS time,
  t.link_code as metric,
  CAST(AVG(t.throughput_bps) AS DOUBLE) as "Throughput (bps)"
FROM dz_link_traffic t
WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR t.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time), t.link_code
HAVING AVG(t.throughput_bps) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "Throughput (bps)" DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time) AS time,
  t.link_code || ' (In)' as metric,
  CAST(
    CASE
      WHEN t.bandwidth_bps IS NULL OR t.bandwidth_bps = 0 THEN NULL
      WHEN AVG(t.in_throughput_bps) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE (AVG(t.in_throughput_bps) / t.bandwidth_bps * 100.0)
    END
  AS DOUBLE) as "Utilization %"
FROM dz_link_traffic t
WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR t.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
  AND t.bandwidth_bps IS NOT NULL
  AND t.bandwidth_bps > 0
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time), t.link_code, t.bandwidth_bps
HAVING AVG(t.in_throughput_bps) IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time) AS time,
  t.link_code || ' (Out)' as metric,
  CAST(
    CASE
      WHEN t.bandwidth_bps IS NULL OR t.bandwidth_bps = 0 THEN NULL
      WHEN AVG(t.out_throughput_bps) IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE (AVG(t.out_throughput_bps) / t.bandwidth_bps * 100.0)
    END
  AS DOUBLE) as "Utilization %"
FROM dz_link_traffic t
WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR t.link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
  AND t.bandwidth_bps IS NOT NULL
  AND t.bandwidth_bps > 0
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time), t.link_code, t.bandwidth_bps
HAVING AVG(t.out_throughput_bps) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "Utilization %" DESC

SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time) AS time,
  t.device_code || ' (In)' as metric,
  CAST(AVG(t.in_throughput_bps) AS DOUBLE) as "Throughput (bps)"
FROM dz_device_traffic t
WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR t.device_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time), t.device_code
HAVING AVG(t.in_throughput_bps) IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time) AS time,
  t.device_code || ' (Out)' as metric,
  CAST(AVG(t.out_throughput_bps) AS DOUBLE) as "Throughput (bps)"
FROM dz_device_traffic t
WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
  AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR t.device_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ','))))
GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time), t.device_code
HAVING AVG(t.out_throughput_bps) IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "Throughput (bps)" DESC

WITH aggregated AS (
  SELECT
    time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time) AS time,
    t.device_code,
    t.user_tunnel_id,
    t.user_pk,
    AVG(t.in_throughput_bps) AS avg_in_throughput_bps,
    AVG(t.out_throughput_bps) AS avg_out_throughput_bps
  FROM dz_user_device_traffic t
  WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR t.device_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ','))))
  GROUP BY time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', t.time), t.device_code, t.user_tunnel_id, t.user_pk
)
SELECT
  time,
  device_code || ':' || CAST(user_tunnel_id AS VARCHAR) || COALESCE(' (' || SUBSTRING(user_pk, 1, 8) || '...)', '') || ' (In)' as metric,
  CAST(avg_in_throughput_bps AS DOUBLE) as "Throughput (bps)"
FROM aggregated
WHERE avg_in_throughput_bps IS NOT NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT
  time,
  device_code || ':' || CAST(user_tunnel_id AS VARCHAR) || COALESCE(' (' || SUBSTRING(user_pk, 1, 8) || '...)', '') || ' (Out)' as metric,
  CAST(avg_out_throughput_bps AS DOUBLE) as "Throughput (bps)"
FROM aggregated
WHERE avg_out_throughput_bps IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC, "Throughput (bps)" DESC

WITH dz_hourly AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', dz.time) AS time_hour,
    mo.code || ' → ' || mt.code as metro_pair,
    quantile_cont(CASE WHEN dz.dz_rtt_us > 0 THEN dz.dz_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS dz_rtt_p95
  FROM dz_metro_to_metro_latency dz
  JOIN dz_metros_current mo ON mo.pk = dz.origin_metro_pk
  JOIN dz_metros_current mt ON mt.pk = dz.target_metro_pk
  WHERE dz.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND dz.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${metro_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR mo.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))) OR mt.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))))
    AND dz.dz_rtt_us IS NOT NULL
    AND dz.dz_rtt_us > 0
  GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', dz.time), mo.code, mt.code
  HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN dz.dz_rtt_us > 0 THEN dz.dz_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
),
internet_hourly AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', inet.time) AS time_hour,
    mo.code || ' → ' || mt.code as metro_pair,
    quantile_cont(CASE WHEN inet.internet_rtt_us > 0 THEN inet.internet_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS internet_rtt_p95
  FROM dz_public_internet_metro_to_metro_latency inet
  JOIN dz_metros_current mo ON mo.pk = inet.origin_metro_pk
  JOIN dz_metros_current mt ON mt.pk = inet.target_metro_pk
  WHERE inet.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND inet.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${metro_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR mo.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))) OR mt.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))))
    AND inet.internet_rtt_us IS NOT NULL
    AND inet.internet_rtt_us > 0
  GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', inet.time), mo.code, mt.code
  HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN inet.internet_rtt_us > 0 THEN inet.internet_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', dz.time_hour) AS time,
  dz.metro_pair as metric,
  CAST(
    CASE
      WHEN internet.internet_rtt_p95 IS NULL OR internet.internet_rtt_p95 = 0 THEN NULL
      WHEN dz.dz_rtt_p95 IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE 100.0 * (1.0 - dz.dz_rtt_p95 / internet.internet_rtt_p95)
    END
  AS DOUBLE) as "% Faster"
FROM dz_hourly dz
JOIN internet_hourly internet ON dz.time_hour = internet.time_hour AND dz.metro_pair = internet.metro_pair
ORDER BY time ASC, metric

panels.title: DZ RTT Improvement vs Internet (% Faster, P95)

targets.rawSql:
WITH dz_hourly AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', dz.time) AS time_hour,
    mo.code || ' → ' || mt.code as metro_pair,
    quantile_cont(CASE WHEN dz.dz_jitter_us > 0 AND dz.dz_jitter_us < 100000 THEN dz.dz_jitter_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS dz_jitter_p95
  FROM dz_metro_to_metro_latency dz
  JOIN dz_metros_current mo ON mo.pk = dz.origin_metro_pk
  JOIN dz_metros_current mt ON mt.pk = dz.target_metro_pk
  WHERE dz.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND dz.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${metro_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR mo.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))) OR mt.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))))
    AND dz.dz_jitter_us IS NOT NULL
    AND dz.dz_jitter_us > 0
    AND dz.dz_jitter_us < 100000
  GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', dz.time), mo.code, mt.code
  HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN dz.dz_jitter_us > 0 AND dz.dz_jitter_us < 100000 THEN dz.dz_jitter_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
),
internet_hourly AS (
  SELECT
    date_trunc('hour', inet.time) AS time_hour,
    mo.code || ' → ' || mt.code as metro_pair,
    quantile_cont(CASE WHEN inet.internet_jitter_us > 0 AND inet.internet_jitter_us < 100000 THEN inet.internet_jitter_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS internet_jitter_p95
  FROM dz_public_internet_metro_to_metro_latency inet
  JOIN dz_metros_current mo ON mo.pk = inet.origin_metro_pk
  JOIN dz_metros_current mt ON mt.pk = inet.target_metro_pk
  WHERE inet.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND inet.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${metro_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR mo.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))) OR mt.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))))
    AND inet.internet_jitter_us IS NOT NULL
    AND inet.internet_jitter_us > 0
    AND inet.internet_jitter_us < 100000
  GROUP BY date_trunc('hour', inet.time), mo.code, mt.code
  HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN inet.internet_jitter_us > 0 AND inet.internet_jitter_us < 100000 THEN inet.internet_jitter_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', dz.time_hour) AS time,
  dz.metro_pair as metric,
  CAST(
    CASE
      WHEN internet.internet_jitter_p95 IS NULL OR internet.internet_jitter_p95 = 0 THEN NULL
      WHEN dz.dz_jitter_p95 IS NULL THEN NULL
      ELSE 100.0 * (1.0 - dz.dz_jitter_p95 / internet.internet_jitter_p95)
    END
  AS DOUBLE) as "% Faster"
FROM dz_hourly dz
JOIN internet_hourly internet ON dz.time_hour = internet.time_hour AND dz.metro_pair = internet.metro_pair
ORDER BY time ASC, metric

panels.title: DZ Jitter Improvement vs Internet (% Faster, P95)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time,
  entity_kind as "Entity Kind",
  entity_code as "Entity Code",
  event_type as "Event Type",
  event_value as "Event Value",
  extra as "Extra"
FROM dz_network_timeline
WHERE time >= $__timeFrom()
  AND time <= $__timeTo()
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 500

WITH metro_stats AS (
  SELECT
    v.origin_metro_code || ' → ' || v.target_metro_code AS metro_pair,
    CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN v.dz_rtt_us > 0 THEN v.dz_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS DOUBLE) AS dz_rtt_p95_us,
    CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN v.internet_rtt_us > 0 THEN v.internet_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS DOUBLE) AS internet_rtt_p95_us,
    CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN v.dz_jitter_us > 0 THEN v.dz_jitter_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS DOUBLE) AS dz_jitter_p95_us,
    CAST(quantile_cont(CASE WHEN v.internet_jitter_us > 0 THEN v.internet_jitter_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) AS DOUBLE) AS internet_jitter_p95_us
  FROM dz_vs_public_internet_metro_to_metro_named v
  WHERE v.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND v.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND ('${metro_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR v.origin_metro_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))) OR v.target_metro_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${metro_code:raw}', ','))))
    AND v.dz_rtt_us IS NOT NULL
    AND v.internet_rtt_us IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY v.origin_metro_code, v.target_metro_code
  HAVING quantile_cont(CASE WHEN v.dz_rtt_us > 0 THEN v.dz_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
    AND quantile_cont(CASE WHEN v.internet_rtt_us > 0 THEN v.internet_rtt_us ELSE NULL END, 0.95) IS NOT NULL
)
SELECT
  metro_pair AS "Metro Pair",
  CAST(dz_rtt_p95_us / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) AS "DZ RTT P95 (ms)",
  CAST(internet_rtt_p95_us / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) AS "Internet RTT P95 (ms)",
  CAST((internet_rtt_p95_us - dz_rtt_p95_us) / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) AS "RTT Improvement (ms)",
  CAST(
    CASE
      WHEN internet_rtt_p95_us IS NULL OR internet_rtt_p95_us = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE 100.0 * (1.0 - dz_rtt_p95_us / internet_rtt_p95_us)
    END
  AS DOUBLE) AS "RTT Improvement %",
  CAST(dz_jitter_p95_us / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) AS "DZ Jitter P95 (ms)",
  CAST(internet_jitter_p95_us / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) AS "Internet Jitter P95 (ms)",
  CAST((internet_jitter_p95_us - dz_jitter_p95_us) / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) AS "Jitter Improvement (ms)",
  CAST(
    CASE
      WHEN internet_jitter_p95_us IS NULL OR internet_jitter_p95_us = 0 THEN NULL
      ELSE 100.0 * (1.0 - dz_jitter_p95_us / internet_jitter_p95_us)
    END
  AS DOUBLE) AS "Jitter Improvement %"
FROM metro_stats
ORDER BY "RTT Improvement %" DESC NULLS LAST

SELECT
  d.code as "Device Code",
  d.status as "Status",
  (d.status = 'activated') as "Operational",
  (d.status IN ('soft-drained','hard-drained')) as "Drained",
  d.as_of_ts as "As Of"
FROM dz_devices_current d
WHERE ('${device_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR d.code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${device_code:raw}', ','))))
ORDER BY d.code

SELECT
  link_code as "Link Code",
  status as "Status",
  is_operational as "Operational",
  is_soft_drained as "Soft Drained",
  is_hard_drained as "Hard Drained",
  CAST(committed_rtt_ns / 1000.0 AS DOUBLE) as "Committed RTT (µs)",
  as_of_ts as "As Of"
FROM dz_links_current_health
WHERE ('${link_code:raw}' = '__ALL__' OR link_code IN (SELECT unnest(string_to_array('${link_code:raw}', ','))))
ORDER BY link_code

WITH time_series AS (
  SELECT time_bucket(INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}', generate_series) as time
  FROM generate_series(
    CAST($__timeFrom() AS TIMESTAMP),
    CAST($__timeTo() AS TIMESTAMP) + INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}',
    INTERVAL '${aggregation_interval}'
  )
),
connected_users AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT
    owner_pk,
    client_ip,
    valid_from,
    COALESCE(valid_to, TIMESTAMP '9999-12-31 00:00:00') as valid_to
  FROM dz_users_history
  WHERE op != 'D'
    AND status = 'activated'
    AND dz_ip IS NOT NULL
    AND owner_pk NOT IN (SELECT owner_pk FROM dz_owners_internal)
    AND valid_from <= CAST($__timeTo() AS TIMESTAMP)
    AND (valid_to IS NULL OR valid_to >= CAST($__timeFrom() AS TIMESTAMP))
)
SELECT
  ts.time,
  'Connected Users' as metric,
  CAST(COUNT(DISTINCT cu.owner_pk || ':' || cu.client_ip) AS DOUBLE) as "Connected Users"
FROM time_series ts
LEFT JOIN connected_users cu
  ON cu.valid_from <= ts.time
  AND cu.valid_to > ts.time
GROUP BY ts.time
ORDER BY ts.time ASC

WITH current_users AS (
  SELECT
    u.pk AS dz_user_pk,
    u.owner_pk,
    u.client_ip,
    u.dz_ip,
    d.code AS device_code,
    u.tunnel_id,
    u.valid_from AS connected_from
  FROM dz_users_history u
  LEFT JOIN dz_devices_current d ON u.device_pk = d.pk
  WHERE u.op != 'D'
    AND u.status = 'activated'
    AND u.valid_from <= CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
    AND (u.valid_to IS NULL OR u.valid_to > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
    AND u.dz_ip IS NOT NULL
    AND u.owner_pk NOT IN (SELECT owner_pk FROM dz_owners_internal)
    AND d.code IS NOT NULL
    AND u.tunnel_id IS NOT NULL
),
traffic_stats AS (
  SELECT
    t.user_pk,
    t.device_code,
    t.user_tunnel_id,
    AVG(t.throughput_bps) AS avg_throughput_bps,
    MAX(t.throughput_bps) AS peak_throughput_bps
  FROM dz_user_device_traffic t
  WHERE t.time >= $__timeFrom()
    AND t.time <= $__timeTo()
    AND t.throughput_bps IS NOT NULL
  GROUP BY t.user_pk, t.device_code, t.user_tunnel_id
)
SELECT
  cu.owner_pk as "Owner PK",
  cu.client_ip as "Client IP",
  cu.dz_ip as "DZ IP",
  cu.device_code as "Device Code",
  cu.tunnel_id as "Tunnel ID",
  cu.connected_from as "Connected Since",
  CAST(ROUND(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - cu.connected_from)) / 86400.0, 1) AS DOUBLE) as "Age (days)",
  CAST(COALESCE(ts.avg_throughput_bps, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Avg Throughput (bps)",
  CAST(COALESCE(ts.peak_throughput_bps, 0) AS DOUBLE) as "Peak Throughput (bps)"
FROM current_users cu
LEFT JOIN traffic_stats ts
  ON ts.user_pk = cu.dz_user_pk
  AND ts.device_code = cu.device_code
  AND ts.user_tunnel_id = CAST(cu.tunnel_id AS BIGINT)
ORDER BY cu.owner_pk, cu.client_ip
LIMIT 500

list.label: Link Code
list.name: link_code
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT code FROM dz_links_current ORDER BY code

list.label: Device Code
list.name: device_code
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT code FROM dz_devices_current ORDER BY code

list.label: Metro Code
list.name: metro_code
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT code FROM dz_metros_current ORDER BY code
